Class DoublingList<E>

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.AbstractSequentialList<E>
DoublingList<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<E>, Collection<E>, List<E>
public class DoublingList<E> extends AbstractSequentialList<E>
An implementation of a list which consists of nodes who contain arrays which double in size each time a new node is added to the list.
Version:
04/09/2024
Author:
Jackson Eshbaugh
